p.i: You are proficient with this weapon if you are proficient with the halberd, glaive, or pike.

description.p: This farming tool has been dangerously refitted to serve as a killing edge on the battlefield. This weapon can only be effectively wielded with two hands.
On a hit, the scythe does 2d4 piercing damage. On a critical hit, a scythe instead deals 8d4 piercing damage. This weapon will critically hit on a 19 or 20.
You may also attack with the blade of the scythe instead of the point. This will do 2d6 slashing damage on a hit, but will not gain the scythes critical hit range or damage.

Rather than deal 2d6 slashing damage with its blade, you can attempt to strike with the scythe's point to deal 2d4 piercing damage. This attack instead has a critical range of 19-20 (which can compound with similar effects) and deals 8d4 piercing damage on a critical hit rather than dealing double the weapon's damage roll.

description.p: This staff sports a much longer, heavier frame than your standard quarterstaff, letting you put some serious weight into your swings with it, but as a result, it can only be effectively wielded with two hands.
On a hit, a battle staff deals 2d6 bludgeoning damage.
Polearm Mastery and other effects that include that set of weapons affect the battle staff.
